problem: 如图,某轮船由东向西航行,在A处测得灯塔M在它的北偏西75°方向上,继续航行8海里到达B处,此时测得灯塔M在它的北偏西60°方向上,则BM=()
comment: 本题考查的是解直角三角形的应用-方向角问题,掌握方向角的概念、熟记锐角三角函数的定义是解题的关键
problem_en: As shown in the figure, a certain ship sails from east to west. At A, it is measured that lighthouse M is in the direction of N_0 to its north by west, and it continues to sail for N_1 nautical miles to reach point B. At this time, it is measured that lighthouse M is in the direction of N_2 to its north by west. Then BM = ()
